title: Durham Probe Reveals Government Access to Unregulated Data Streams
sub_head: Special counsel’s investigation into origins of FBI’s Russia probe points to how cybersecurity researchers and government agencies tap into huge reservoirs of potentially revealing internet data
body: The latest developments in a high-profile criminal probe by special counsel John Durham show the extent to which the world’s internet traffic is being monitored by a coterie of network researchers and security experts inside and outside the government.
